mapper.insert: insert into cigarette (product_name, url, direct_retail_price, whole_sale_price, gross_profit_margin, place_of_origin, entry_time, price_type, is_on_sale, factory_name, tar_qty, nicotine_qty, product_style, package_qty, package_qty2, selling_points, product_code) value (#{productName}, #{url}, #{directRetailPrice}, #{wholeSalePrice}, #{grossProfitMargin}, #{placeOfOrigin}, #{entryTime}, #{priceType}, #{isOnSale},#{factoryName}, #{tarQty}, #{nicotineQty}, #{productStyle}, #{packageQty}, #{packageQty2}, #{sellingPoints}, #{productCode})
